name: Pig Dice (Bazaya)
description:
You can buy real pig dice. But I wanted to turn them into an app so that you can play with your friends anywhere.

Tap in the middle of the screen to throw the pigs. There are 4 small calculators to count the points. Each player uses his calculator. The wide buttons change the camera. The ?-Button shows the rules of the game. The other Button changes the Color of the Pigs.

Try your Luck and have Fun!

You can play the Game in the Browser or you download it for Android

Note: It´s the first Time I exported a Unity game as an Android Build. It may not work for everyone. I tried to install it on 3 dieferent divices and it worked on 2 out of 3  times.
